tool.name: Y Ploidy Check DRAGEN
tool.description: Checks the ploidy of the y chromosome from DRAGEN metrics.json to confirm specification in samplesheet

param.name: sampleid
param.label: Sample ID
param.help: Run identifier to create subdirectory from.

param.name: email
param.label: Admin Email
param.help: Send failure reports to this email address

tool.help: This tool performs the quality control step of confirming that the biological sex of the sample as estimated by DRAGEN is the same as the biological sex provided in the SampleSheet.
